name: I am coming in 5 minutes
description:
OVERALL

Mom just bought ice cream and now she is coming home. However, the house is  a complete mess and you have just 5 minutes (2:30 in real time) to clean everything up. Or else ...

INSTRUCTIONS

According to the difficulty can choose, there are several items around the house, and you must place all of them in the right spot before the timer runs out.

WASD/Arrows - Move

E-Pick up item

Space-Place item

INFORMATION

This game is made in only 3 days, so expect some bugs. This is only a prototype of a game and full-release may happen in the future.

All assets are preserved.
